title: President speaks of new areas of cooperation with Russia
content: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa says he hopes to further consolidate and expand the existing solid partnership with Russia into new areas of cooperation.He is issuing a felicitation message to his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin on the occasion of 65 years of diplomatic relations between the two countries.The abiding friendship and vibrant relations between Sri Lanka and Russia are time-tested, and mutually rewarding, said Rajapaksa.“Underpinned by shared values and mutual respect, relations between our two countries have continued to flourish over the years, promising further expansion into multiple spheres of shared interest,” he added.
